hadiths.text: ‘Umar bin Al Khattab reported the Apostle of Allaah(ﷺ) as saying “Actions are to be judged only by intentions and a man will have only what he intended. When one’s emigration is to Allaah and His Apostle, his emigration is to Allaah and His Apostle but his emigration is to a worldly end at which he aims or to a woman whom he marries , his emigration is to that for which he emigrated

chapter.ara-name: باب فِيمَا عُنِيَ بِهِ الطَّلاَقُ وَالنِّيَّاتُ
chapter.eng-name: Regarding Statements That Equate To Divorce, And Intentions
